text: Jonas Gerard Mkude (born 3 December 1992) is a Tanzanian football player who plays a midfielder. He currently plays for Simba SC. Jonas Mkude is also a member of the Tanzania national football team. He made his international debut on 23 February 2012 against the Democratic Republic of the Congo. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Tanzanian footballers Category:Tanzania international footballers Category:Simba S.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Jonas Mkude
